0.5.1.name: wordpress/where-ive-been
0.5.1.description:
Where I've Been embeds your whereivebeen.com maps on your Wordpress blog.

I created this plugin after searching for an easy way to embed whereivebeen.com maps on Wordpress blogs and not finding one. Please visit the plugin homepage (http://www.nicmyers.com/where-ive-been-wordpress-plugin/) for updates and more information.

0.6.0 New Feature

You can now change the width of your map by adding the width="" attribute to your shortcode. The height is automatically calculated for you.
